short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Blocks images and videos on user selected sites. Flip the toggle or use the Alt+i hotkey to turn on or off.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The "Image and Video Blocker" hides images and videos on selected sites. Add and remove sites via the options page (right click on the extension, click options). Adding sites also has the option to match on subdomains or not. Flip the extension toggle or use the Alt+i hotkey to turn the extension on or off.

Hide distracting images!

Built with the help of ChatGPT.
